EmailTemplate.name: 2024 Price Increase, Non-Admin User
EmailTemplate.subject: Subscription Request Invalid
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your request to change your subscription is invalid as you are not an Admin User on your firm’s account. Please have an Admin User send a separate request to subscription.change@mycase.com in order to switch your subscription to the basic plan.
Please contact support with any questions here between the hours of 6am - 5pm PT; we’d be happy to help you.
Sincerely,
The MyCase Team
